map - Static variable in class rover.Rover
A map of the whole intervention zone.
Map - Class in rover
Extended version of an abstract MapZone.
Map() - Constructor for class rover.Map
 
MapZone - Class in rover
Absolute frame: origin left down (starting zone side is down) corner of the map; X axis is defined along the length of the map Relative frame: origin is the initial position of the rover, center of the starting zone; X axis is defined by initial rover heading, along the length of the map (2.5m) All MapZones will be defined in relative frame.
MapZone() - Constructor for class rover.MapZone
 
margin - Static variable in class rover.Rover
A margin all around the zone to avoid going out, in m.
MAX_OBJECT_SIZE - Static variable in class rover.Rover
The maximum object size in the zone.
Measure - Class in tools
Data container to read from any peripheral indifferently.
Measure(float) - Constructor for class tools.Measure
Takes a value and stores it inside a Measure data container.
MIN_DIST_DETECTION - Static variable in class rover.Rover
A security distance for the ultrasonic sensor.
mission_done() - Method in class rover.Rover
Tells whether a mission is done or not.
mode - Variable in class rover.Rover
Current mode of the rover, used to broadcast appropriate sound and light effects.
motor - Variable in class rover.Grabber
The motor controlled by the rover to actuate the pliers.
motor_speed - Variable in class rover.Grabber
The given speed of the motor controlling the pliers, in degrees per second.
